actions.text: On agreeing to the Ribble amendment (A064) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A064) offered by Mr. Ribble to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A064) offered by Mr. Ribble to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ribble amendment (A064) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment increases the air-mile radius from 50 air-miles to 75 air-miles for the transportation of construction materials and equipment to satisfy the 24-hour reset period under Hours of Service rules and gives States the ability to opt out of this increase if the distance is entirely included within the State's borders.
purpose: An amendment No. 23 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to increase the air-mile radius from 50 air-miles to 75 air-miles for the transportation of construction materials and equipment, to satisfy the 24-hour reset period under Hours of Service rules and gives states the ability to opt out of this increase if the distance is entirely included within the state's borders.
